summary: This is an email chain from August 26, 2019, regarding seating arrangements for an upcoming Epstein hearing. The Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) plans to attend, and FBI personnel coordinate to ensure SDNY reserves seating for him and potentially others on the case team.

persons.name: ADIC
persons.context: The ADIC plans to attend the Epstein hearing, and seating needs to be reserved for him.

events.title: Epstein Hearing
events.description: An upcoming hearing related to the Epstein case, likely in the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

keyFacts: The Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) planned to attend an Epstein hearing scheduled for August 27, 2019.
FBI personnel in New York coordinated with SDNY to reserve seating for the ADIC and potentially other case team members.
The email exchange shows high-level law enforcement interest and logistical planning for court proceedings in the Epstein case.
